name: cats1cli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cword(universe))
-| wceq(c0, co(c1, cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wcel(co(c1, cconcat, cs1(c2)), cword(universe))

-| wceq(c0, co(c1, cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wcel(co(c1, cconcat, cs1(c2)), cword(universe))

stmt.pretty: mp2an((c1[++]<" c2 ">)∈ Word(𝕌), c1 ∈ Word(𝕌), <" c2 "> ∈ Word(𝕌))
